vulnerable.commit_message: Fix for CVE-2015-2141. Thanks to Evgeny Sidorov for reporting. Squaring to satisfy Jacobi requirements suggested by JPM.
vulnerable.cve_desc: The InvertibleRWFunction::CalculateInverse function in rw.cpp in libcrypt++ 5.6.2 does not properly blind private key operations for the Rabin-Williams digital signature algorithm, which allows remote attackers to obtain private keys via a timing attack.
